RelatedSentence: The conference , ' Comprehensive Test Ban Treaty ( CTBT ) - Regional Conference for States in Southeast Asia , the Pacific and Far East ' , is being attended by officials from the UN Office for Disarmament Affairs , UN Regional Centre for Peace and Disarmament , and representatives from the European Union ( EU ) , acording to Xinhua .

The event has been aimed at pushing forward the enforcement of the CTBT regime in those regions and boosting capacity building for countries willing to take the benefits from CTBT technologies for science and peace purposes , the Indonesian foreign ministry said in a statement .

RelatedSentence: The conference will also discuss the role of the CTBT regime in preserving peace and stability in the regions .
The conference was in line with Indonesia 's interests in promoting nuclear disarmament drive , the statement said .
